comment_detailed: The study was a double‑blind, randomized, placebo‑controlled trial of 192 type 2 diabetic patients receiving either 500 mg/day or 40 mg/day resveratrol or placebo for 6 months. Baseline and follow‑up values for HbA1c, fasting plasma glucose (FPG) and HOMA‑IR were extracted from Table 1 and Table 2. Standard deviations for follow‑up values were not reported, so they are set to null. The intervention arms are represented as "intervention" and the placebo arm as "control".
evidence: "192 T2DM patients were randomized to resveratrol 500mg/day (Resv500 arm), resveratrol 40mg/day (Resv40 arm) or placebo for 6 months"
comment: Data extracted for HbA1c, FPG, HOMA‑IR at 24 weeks
